Author: GitHub
Title: Empowering business leaders to scale innovation in the age of AI
Description:
As agentic AI , like GitHub Copilot, transforms software development, enterprise administrators and platform engineering teams are becoming the architects of possibility—ensuring that when human developers and their agent teammates accelerate innovation, they're building on a foundation of security, governance, and control with tools like GitHub Advanced Security. In this session, GitHub's Chief Product Officer Mario Rodriguez celebrates GitHub admins, the unsung heroes who balance developer choice and velocity with enterprise requirements. Through practical demos, see how GitHub's latest enterprise capabilities, including GitHub Copilot Enterprise, deliver governance at scale at the pace of AI-powered development. Because shipping faster shouldn't mean admins have to work harder.

Speakers: Kate Catlin, Senior Product Manager, GitHub (Speaker) Mario Rodriguez, Chief Product Officer, GitHub (Speaker) Todd Manion, VP, Product Management, GitHub (Speaker)

— CHAPTERS —

00:00:00 A new book: The future of agentic development 00:04:28 Demo: Transforming the SDLC with custom agents 00:06:54 Demo: Partner agents from Amplitude and Arm 00:11:51 Live demo: Creating a custom agent in VS Code 00:17:36 Delivering new enterprise-grade controls 00:20:41 Announcing the new Copilot Metrics dashboard 00:21:41 Demo: Measuring impact with Copilot Metrics 00:27:27 Announcing the agent control plane 00:28:03 Demo: Governing agents with the new control plane 00:35:18 Conclusion: The future of developer and agent collaboration
